document.full_text: popular books usually make good candidates for movies. but the producers behind "judy moody and the not bummer summer" decided to create an entirely original adventure for the mischievous third grader's big screen debut.
document.title: "judy moody" children's books find new life on film
lines_and_colors: popular books usually make good candidates for movies. but the producers behind "judy moody and the not bummer summer" decided to create an entirely original adventure for the mischievous third grader's big screen debut.
